description: Episode 4 of 'Hot House Flippers' continues its home-makeover show with host Austin Avery welcoming his favorite interior designer, Colby Tucker. Austin complies with a relentless, bareback pounding that redecorates Colby's interior and makes the designer shoot his load which Austin scoops up and uses as lube for his final thrusts, which send him over the edge blasting his seed on Colby.
title: Hot House Flippers
